0.name: Frost Thorn
0.fullDesc: Deals Ice DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single enemy.

0.name: Darting Ironthorn
0.fullDesc: Deals Ice DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy and activates Soulsteel Sync for 1 turn.
0.shortDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a single enemy and activates the Soulsteel Sync.

0.name: Amidst the Raining Bliss
0.fullDesc: Increases Yanqing's CRIT Rate by {{1}}%. When Soulsteel Sync is active, increases Yanqing's CRIT DMG by an extra <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong>. This <u>buff</u> lasts for one turn. Afterwards, deals Ice DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong> of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.
0.shortDesc: Increases Yanqing's CRIT Rate. Enhances "Soulsteel Sync" and deals massive Ice DMG to a single enemy.

0.name: The One True Sword
0.fullDesc: After using his Technique, at the start of the next battle, Yanqing deals {{2}}% more DMG for {{3}} turn(s) to enemies whose current HP is {{1}}% or higher.
0.shortDesc: After this character uses Technique, at the start of the next battle, increases the DMG dealt by this character to enemy targets whose HP is <unbreak>50%</unbreak> or higher.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
